body: Would it be against the rules if I went on my brother's account and got him prestige? Thanks :D
body_tagged: Would it be against the rules if I went on my brother's account and got him prestige? Thanks :D
title: Earning prestige on my brother's account.

replies.body: What rule do you think it is breaking? In short. No.
replies.body_tagged: What rule do you think it is breaking? In short. No.

replies.body: It would be good to get your brothers consent before logging into his account, but you can be on any account to get a prestige on Avicus :)
replies.body_tagged: It would be good to get your brothers consent before logging into his account, but you can be on any account to get a prestige on Avicus :)

reply_to.body: It would be good to get your brothers consent before logging into his account, but you can be on any account to get a prestige on Avicus :)
reply_to.body_tagged: It would be good to get your brothers consent before logging into his account, but you can be on any account to get a prestige on Avicus :)

replies.body: If he isn't banned, then it's fine, just have his permission and don't break any rules on his account.
replies.body_tagged: If he isn't banned, then it's fine, just have his permission and don't break any rules on his account.

replies.body: What is the purpose of prestige if you don't earn it yourself? I see it as a milestone.
replies.body_tagged: What is the purpose of prestige if you don't earn it yourself? I see it as a milestone.

reply_to.body: What is the purpose of prestige if you don't earn it yourself? I see it as a milestone.
reply_to.body_tagged: What is the purpose of prestige if you don't earn it yourself? I see it as a milestone.

replies.body: How the hell is it an infraction...
replies.body_tagged: How the hell is it an infraction...

/ban legoche getting prestige on his brothers account
